rows.label: tlk45320122_05_msg0001
rows.name:
The refugees from Acedia have
arrived and we're doing what we
can in the base to deal with them.

rows.label: tlk45320122_05_msg0002
rows.name:
From what I heard, Iira
attacked them with some
Divine Beast-like...thing.

rows.label: tlk45320122_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Two Divine Beasts fighting each
other... It's the stuff of nightmares.

rows.label: tlk45320122_05_msg0004
rows.name:
There's rumors Superbia's moved up
near the World Tree as well...

rows.label: tlk45320122_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm worried for my dad back in
the home country. I hope he'll
agree to evacuate here too...
